about_the_game:
As the Blight grows with each passing day, the worlds wither in turn. The drifting planes that still light the sky fade like embers, and the powers that live to see them covet dominion of the few centuries that remain. A young man from a distant plane is taken from his home, and fights to find peace, before all ends in silence.

A GALACTIC JOURNEY

A campaign split into 3 books, each containing a variety of enormous levels to be explored and plundered. Ancient temples, shadowy space piers, towering cities; all dense with loot, secrets, and deadly encounters.

BUILD YOUR PARTY

Swashbuckle and parry with dual cutlasses, rocket jump with a mecha arm cannon, battle as a knight in explosive armour, or just throw big rocks at people. Use 6 characters, 100+ unique weapons across 18 types, plus a wide range of skills, combat abilities, passive-granting armours, and items that all make meaningful differences to how you play.

TRUE CHALLENGE

'Essence' from slain foes turns into 'shards', which are spent to unlock new power, but be warned that those same shards are your continues. Die with none in hand, and the book begins anew. A ranking system makes enemies increasingly relentless the better you perform, but also gives you more essence. Mastery expands possibilities.

UNCOVER THE PAST

Immerse yourself in a grand story inspired by classic pulp fantasy, equal parts mature and unhinged, brought to life with detailed passages of prose, telling a personal tale atop a brewing intrigue and an ancient tragedy.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains blood, cursing, partial nudity, and sexual themes.
